DOC.detailed_description: A multicentre randomize control trial Sample size 130 subject . Primary Outcome fracture heal 3 month via x-ray clinical assessment . Radiographic healing define bridge two cortex see x-ray . Radiographic assessment centrally adjudicate committee three study investigator . Clinical healing assess use Function Index Trauma ( FIX-IT ) . ( Bhandari et al , data press ) Secondary outcome measurement include patient-reported quality life CT quantification fracture callus volume . Quality life measure Short-Form 36 Version 2 ( SF-36 ) instrument follow-up interval . A CT scan fracture site perform 3 month follow-up . Using quantitative protocol volume callus measure extent cortical bridging assess . Additional secondary outcome include radiographic patient-important complication . These include adverse event , delay union ( > 6 month ) , non union ( failure fracture heal progress serial x-ray 6 9 month ) , malalignment ( > 5 degree ) , hardware failure , infection , reoperation . Information surround type complication , duration , management and/or treatment complication record A Data Safety Monitoring Board establish independently monitor trial data .
